entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:11 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
